ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer

Class ClusteringController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.ClusteringController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GUIClusteringController, SimpleClusteringController

    public abstract class ClusteringController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller component of the M-V-C-pattern used for the clustering subsystem. (M:TreeBuilder-V:TreeVisualizer-C:ClusteringController)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private TreeBuilder treeBuilder
      The data model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClusteringController()
      Instantiates a new ClusteringController and a new TreeBuilder.
      ClusteringController(TreeBuilder treeBuilder)
      Instantiates a new ClusteringController that controls the passed TreeBuilder.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the controlled TreeBuilder.
      abstract ClusterResult resumeClusteringRun(java.lang.String pathToWriteSerializedObject)
      Resumes a previously started clustering process.
      protected void startClustering()
      Starts the clustering process of the TreeBuilder in a new thread.

      Configurates the TreeBuilder of this controller, starts the clustering process and returns the cluster tree as a ClusterResult.

    • Method Detail

      • startNewClusteringRun

        public abstract ClusterResult startNewClusteringRun(INodeUpdater nodeUpdater,
                                  InitialNodesCreator leafNodes,
                                  java.lang.String pathToWriteSerializedObject)
        Configurates the TreeBuilder of this controller, starts the clustering process and returns the cluster tree as a ClusterResult.
        Parameters:
        nodeUpdater - the node updater to use in the clustering process
        leafNodes - the initial clusters used as leaves in the cluster tree
        pathToWriteSerializedObject - the file system location to write the serialized TreeBuilder
        Returns:
        the cluster result as ClusterResult object.

      • resumeClusteringRun

        public abstract ClusterResult resumeClusteringRun(java.lang.String pathToWriteSerializedObject)
        Resumes a previously started clustering process.
        Parameters:
        pathToWriteSerializedObject - location for the new serialization file. If null no file is created.
        Returns:
        the result of the clustering process

      • terminateClustering

        protected ClusterResult terminateClustering()
        Fetches the ClusteringResult object from the TreeBuilder. The thread calling this method does only return after the clustering process running in a different thread started with startClustering is completed. (Blocking)
        Returns:
        the clustering result

      • getTreeBuilder

        protected final TreeBuilder getTreeBuilder()
        Gets the controlled TreeBuilder.
        Returns:
        the TreeBuilder of this controller.

      • startClustering

        protected final void startClustering()
        Starts the clustering process of the TreeBuilder in a new thread.
